comment: Wah kya RIM hai tubeless tyre ki Mohd Shareef Cycle Mistri n Samaj Sewak too wat kind of samaj sewa he do
amr:
# ::snt Wah kya RIM hai tubeless tyre ki Mohd Shareef Cycle Mistri n Samaj Sewak too wat kind of samaj sewa he do
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (w / wah
                  :mode expressive)
            :op2 (w2 / wish-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "RIM")))
            :op3 (w3 / wish-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG1 (t / tire
                        :mod (t2 / tubeless))))
      :snt2 a
      :op1 (w4 / wish-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (e / event
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Mohd"
                        :op2 "Shareef"
                        :op3 "Cycle"
                        :op4 "Mistri")))
      :op2 (w5 / wish-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 e
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Samaj"
                  :op2 "Sewak")
            :mod (k / kind))
      :snt3 (d / do-02
            :ARG0 (h / he)
            :ARG1 (s / samaj)
            :mod (t3 / too)))
